sections.title: Net annual income
sections.text: The net annual income referred to is calculated as the total annual income after the deduction of associated costs and charges, social contributions, and taxes.

sections.title: Total liquid assets
sections.text: The total liquid assets referred to shall be calculated as the sum of the total cash held by you on savings accounts and current accounts as well as the value of assets that can be easily and swiftly converted into cash.

sections.title: Annual financial commitments
sections.text: The annual financial commitments referred to shall include all the expenditures for which you have undertaken a commitment in relation to in this calendar year.

sections.title: Net Worth
sections.text: The mentioned net worth is calculated as (net annual income) + (total of liquid assets) - (annual financial commitments). This simulation gives you an indication of your ability to bear losses.
